description:
Additional Resources that helps / supports integration
            testing on a kubernetes operator written with the KubeOps
            operator sdk.
releaseNotes:
# [3.0.0-prerelease.1](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/compare/v2.5.0...v3.0.0-prerelease.1) (2021-01-24)


### Bug Fixes

* Correctly translate the kubernetes special fields in crds. ([e5573c4](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/e5573c4ed8cc50772a969313cc6bcc553b8bc89e))


### Features

* **crd generation:** Add additional printer columns. ([#118](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/118)) ([1fd76c3](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/1fd76c32f7ca3e1f8a091032f2b69ead2f618c22)), closes [#60](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/60)
* **documentation:** Add documentation for public elements of the libs ([#119](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/119)) ([f97a3ef](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/f97a3ef7c7a42bd726a155daaaae47ebb7e0fd27))
* **events:** Add event support for resources and controllers. ([#132](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/132)) ([3537772](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/3537772c55905443e940138181338ab0457f43b6)), closes [#5](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/5)
* **logging:** Remove the structured logger in favor of JsonLogger. ([8a6bf9d](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/8a6bf9d1f2aac8fcb79978af0acdc5c2e757f2fa))
* **webhooks:** Add validation webhooks and cert support. ([#136](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/136)) ([6633845](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/66338452ffb5d02aafbac9edaa54b4145605f3a1)), closes [#3](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/3)
* add KubeOpsBasePath to msbuild properties ([#117](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/117)) ([532b878](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/532b8789f539b466af634351dbf618eb48096e8e))


### BREAKING CHANGES

* **logging:** This removes the structured console logger.
Dotnet 5.0 provides a simple logger (default) as well as a
json logger.
